name: XWUI Visually Hidden Component
description: Component that hides content visually while keeping it accessible to screen readers. Follows ARIA best practices for visually hidden content. Useful for accessibility improvements and screen reader support.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

as.description: HTML element tag name to render

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the visually hidden element

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

children.description: Children element or HTML string (alias for content)
